üß≠ Three Ventures, One Philosophy

I‚Äôve been thinking a lot about how to align my work with what I believe ‚Äî not just spiritually, but economically and technologically.

Inspired by people like nostr:nprofile1q9n8wumn8ghj7enfd36x2u3wdehhxarj9emkjmn99ah8qatzxy6nx7rdv4urgvncx33kserxxu6nw6rsxdcnv7ncv9nhj6mtv44nwuryvamh2amyxqmngwfkx3jxk7tgvyuhxwpjwfuh2wplvfex7ctyvdshxapaw3e82egpremhxue69uhkummnw3ez6er9wch8wetvd3hhyer9wghxuet59uqzpfzdhjd25dt3w6nafawrzp5yd6sfddnduz6sacu6la2t42mvf06ts86un7  of Peony Lane Wine, I want to build businesses that aren‚Äôt just products ‚Äî they‚Äôre expressions of conviction. Proof of work, not proof of marketing.

Right now, I‚Äôm stewarding three ventures:

üèõ Golden Gate Group Investments
This is where I hold several Texas properties. It‚Äôs more than an LLC ‚Äî it‚Äôs a seed for something bigger.
I want this to become a Bitcoin-first real estate venture. Rents in BTC. Property purchases on-chain. Long-term, sovereign ownership ‚Äî grounded in trust and time preference.

üåç Blue Planet Ventures
Right now, it‚Äôs still new ‚Äî but it represents my intent to explore the intersection of capital, responsibility, and long-term sustainability.
This could evolve into a fund or studio focused on high-integrity trading, Bitcoin-aligned impact models, or regenerative finance powered by proof of work.
A place to take risks ‚Äî not for hype, but for stewardship.

ü§ñ StartNation
Co-founded with Kevin, who sees it as an AI-centric engine for empowering startups. I share that vision.
We help early-stage ventures grow by trading equity for talent, not VC capital.
While Bitcoin isn‚Äôt woven into StartNation‚Äôs mission today, the deeper philosophy ‚Äî skin in the game, long-term value, sustainability ‚Äî still resonates with everything I believe.

Not every venture I touch will scream ‚ÄúBitcoin‚Äù from the outside.
But inside ‚Äî at the level of conviction, ethics, and vision ‚Äî I know what anchors me.

Proof of Work isn‚Äôt just a protocol.
It‚Äôs a way of showing up.

‚Äî

‚úçÔ∏è ChatGPT helped me write this‚Äîbut the architecture, the philosophy, and the direction are mine.
